title: Video Tutorial - C
body: Learn the fundamentals of the C programming language from scratch

content.detail: In this video tutorial we will cover the essential fundamentals of the C programming language, ideal for those who want to get started in low-level programming and understand how they directly interact with memory and the system. Through practical examples, we will explain how to write efficient and structured code that lays the foundation for more complex developments.

title: How to make a .man page
body: Learn to create custom manual pages

content.detail: In this mini-tutorial you will learn how to create a custom manual page (.man) for any program or script you develop, regardless of the language. This not only improves the presentation of your tool, but also allows other users to access its documentation from the terminal with a simple man command.

title: Python for Beginners
body: Complete Python course from scratch to intermediate level

content.detail: Learn Python from basic concepts to advanced techniques. Ideal for those who want to start programming or improve their skills.

title: Advanced React Hooks
body: Master the most advanced React hooks

content.detail: Deep dive into custom hooks, useMemo, useCallback and other advanced React techniques.

title: Docker and Kubernetes
body: Complete guide to containerization and orchestration

content.detail: Learn to use Docker to containerize applications and Kubernetes to orchestrate them in production.
Complete tutorial on GraphQL, from basic concepts to practical implementation with Apollo Client.

title: Advanced TypeScript
body: Advanced TypeScript techniques for large projects

content.detail: Learn advanced TypeScript techniques like generics, utility types, and design patterns.

title: Testing with Jest
body: Write effective tests for JavaScript and React

content.detail: Learn to configure Jest, write unit tests, integration tests and effective mocks.
Learn to create robust APIs using Node.js and Express, including authentication and error handling.
Learn to use MongoDB with Mongoose to create applications with scalable NoSQL databases.
Learn advanced Git techniques, branching strategies, and effective collaboration with GitHub.
Configure complete CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions to automate tests and deployments.
